markdownRemark.html:
I recently installed Arch Linux on a spare laptop. I screwed it up 3 times. Here’s what I did wrong:

  • Forgot to mark the Arch drive as bootable using fdisk
  • Forgot to install the device drivers for my wifi adapter before booting into the new OS
  • Messed up the GRUB bootloader by configuring it wrong

frontmatter.title: Installing Arch linux
frontmatter.description: How I messed up installing Arch 3 times, before finally getting it to work
